column5: Looking for a Good Spot In Dryden ?Thanks In Advancce
Definitely Riverview Lodge for dinner, my first choice for breakfast is the Central Hotel (old style working mans restaurant), TransCanada or Patricia Inn are other breakfast choices.
I have stopped a few times and had breakfast at the Chalet Inn, price was reasonable and the food was good
Staying at the TransCanada tomorrow night. Early 4a wake up Thus AM and move north to Red Lake. Chimo Air is flying us to Woodland Caribou for 6 nights.
Lunch or Dinner spot in Dryden is Masala....East Indian, Thai and Greek! Excellent food, reasonably priced. Try it, you wont be dissapointed
Riverview Lodge prime rib. Treat yourself it is as good as I have had anywhere.
Kupper's Restaurant is very good for lunch, don't know if they do breakfast
